root.name: Golden Basket
root.description: Golden Basket is a basketball released in 1990 for PC and PC-like consoles. The game was made in Spain, and as such follows the rules of the International Basketball Federation, whose rules vary from the NBA rules most basketball games incorporate. The game features local multiplayer and multiple difficulties of play. Despite using a different rule set, the game's highest difficulties are labeled as "N.B.A." The game was released in Spanish with no known translations into other languages.
